name: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits in their small town.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in recorded history — to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: The Boys
description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their powers.
